=== Current Issues ===
With Ubuntu Gutsy Gibbon: headphone and microphone jack don't work, wireless requires wicd, network manager doesn't work, hibernate and suspend don't work, brightness control is buggy.
Testing was done on this kernel: 2.6.22-14-generic
